identified-content.person: FRIEDMAN, NATASHA EDEN ARABY FELICITE (NATASHA EDEN ARABY FELICITE TAUBER)

block.p: Natasha Eden Araby Felicite Friedman, a daughter of Marvin Ross Friedman of Coral Gables, Fla., and the late Sheila Friedman, is to be married today to Daniel Efrem Tauber, a son of Adele and Ronald Tauber of New York. Rabbi Haskel Lookstein is to officiate at the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens in Miami.
The bride and the bridegroom graduated from the University of Pennsylvania, where they met.

Natasha Eden Araby Felicite Friedman, a daughter of Marvin Ross Friedman of Coral Gables, Fla., and the late Sheila Friedman, is to be married today to Daniel Efrem Tauber, a son of Adele and Ronald Tauber of New York. Rabbi Haskel Lookstein is to officiate at the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens in Miami.
The bride and the bridegroom graduated from the University of Pennsylvania, where they met.

The bride, 26, also received an associate's degree from Parsons School of Design. She is an analyst at Pario Ventures, a venture capital firm in New York. Her father is a lawyer in Miami and a dealer in 20th-century art.

The bridegroom, 27, is a candidate for an M.B.A. degree at Columbia University. His father is a partner in Sage Capital Management, a hedge fund in White Plains, and is the United States chairman of the Art Loss Register, which operates a database that tracks stolen art.
